entry.title: The Starlight Heir
entry.summary:
Author: moonintuition

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,944Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: After a devastating attack on the Lantern Festival leaves the Valdaran monarchy in ruins, Crown Princess Maelle, Prince Thalen, and Princess Elira are sent into exile by the final wishes of their late parents. Their destination: Gotham City—a place of vigilantes, secrets, and scars not so different from their own.Welcomed into the home of Bruce Wayne, a longtime ally of their parents, and the crown, the siblings are thrust into a life they never imagined: attending a gritty Gotham prep school, navigating a world where their titles mean nothing, and confronting grief too heavy for even a crown to carry. For Maelle, that bond deepens with someone sharp, guarded, and as burdened by legacy as she is. What begins as mutual distrust slowly grows into something fragile and fierce, forcing her to question everything she thought she knew about duty, desire, and her place in the world.As they begin to rebuild from their loss, each finds an unexpected kind of family in Gotham’s shadowed protectors.
